LEARN_MORE_NAV_FEATURES.description: Link to an overview page of Chromebooks’ core features and benefits

LEARN_MORE_NAV_OFFLINE.description: Link to a page explaining Chromebook devices’ offline capabilities

LEARN_MORE_NAV_PRINTING.description: Link to a page explaining Chromebook’s printing capabilities

LEARN_MORE_NAV_DO_MORE.description: Link to a page highlighting additional Chromebook features

LEARN_MORE_FEATURES_SPEED_TITLE.description: Summarizes the idea that, when you use a Chromebook, you won’t have to wait for the device to start working

LEARN_MORE_FEATURES_SPEED_DESCRIPTION.message: Chromebooks starten in wenigen Sekunden. Sie können also sofort loslegen und arbeiten, spielen oder das tun, worauf Sie gerade Lust haben.
LEARN_MORE_FEATURES_SPEED_DESCRIPTION.description: Explains that Chromebooks have very short startup time from cold boot, meaning that users can quickly start accomplishing desired tasks

LEARN_MORE_FEATURES_SPEED_SECTION1_TITLE.description: Summarizes that Chromebooks have very short startup time and do not slow down over time

LEARN_MORE_FEATURES_SPEED_SECTION1_DESCR.message: Chromebooks starten in weniger als 10 Sekunden und werden im Gegensatz zu anderen Laptops nicht langsamer.
LEARN_MORE_FEATURES_SPEED_SECTION1_DESCR.description: Explains 2 key differentiating benefits of Chromebooks: they have very short bootup time and stay fast even after continued use

LEARN_MORE_FEATURES_SPEED_SECTION2_TITLE.description: Summarizes that when you use a Chromebook, you can surf the internet faster

LEARN_MORE_FEATURES_SPEED_SECTION2_DESCR.message: Dank integrierter Funktionen wie Chrome Instant können Sie blitzschnell im Web surfen.
LEARN_MORE_FEATURES_SPEED_SECTION2_DESCR.description: Explains that the Chrome Instant features is included with your Chromebook, which enables very fast web surfing

LEARN_MORE_FEATURES_APPS_TITLE.description: Summarizes that Chromebooks are easy and simple, leading to reduced hassles and more enjoyment of the things that you want from a computer

LEARN_MORE_FEATURES_APPS_DESCRIPTION.message: Auf Chromebooks sind schon viele Apps an Bord. Sie können also sofort loslegen.
LEARN_MORE_FEATURES_APPS_DESCRIPTION.description: Explains that many applications are already included and pre-installed on the Chromebook, meaning that brand new Chromebooks include many programs that users need

LEARN_MORE_FEATURES_APPS_SECTION1_TITLE.description: Summarizes that applications on Chromebooks are easier to use than applications on other computers

LEARN_MORE_FEATURES_APPS_SECTION1_DESCRI.message: Google Docs, Hangouts und Play Music sind bereits kostenlos auf Ihrem Chromebook vorinstalliert. Neue Apps können Sie direkt vom Chrome Web Store herunterladen.
LEARN_MORE_FEATURES_APPS_SECTION1_DESCRI.description: Lists Google applications that are pre-installed in the Chromebook at no additional cost. Additionally, more applications can be added to the Chromebook using the Chrome Web Store.

LEARN_MORE_FEATURES_APPS_SECTION2_TITLE.description: Summarizes that Chromebook stays updated automatically, ensuring that it always runs the latest Operating System

LEARN_MORE_FEATURES_APPS_SECTION2_DESCRI.message: Chromebooks laden Updates automatisch herunter, ohne nervige Pop-ups.
LEARN_MORE_FEATURES_APPS_SECTION2_DESCRI.description: Explains that Chromebooks don’t need to be manually updated and that the process happens automatically in the background, without the need for user intervention

LEARN_MORE_FEATURES_SECURITY_TITLE.description: Summarizes that, when you use a Chromebook, you don’t need to worry about viruses or losing your files due to system malfunctions

LEARN_MORE_FEATURES_SECURITY_DESCRIPTION.message: Chromebooks verfügen über einen integrierten Virenschutz. Ihre Dateien werden online gesichert.
LEARN_MORE_FEATURES_SECURITY_DESCRIPTION.description: Explains that all Chromebooks are protected from viruses automatically, and that files are stored safely in the cloud when connected to the internet

LEARN_MORE_FEATURES_SECURITY_SECTION1_TI.description: Summarizes that Chromebooks employ more than 1 method of protecting the device from issues like viruses

LEARN_MORE_FEATURES_SECURITY_SECTION1_DE.message: Durch die verschiedenen Sicherheitsebenen bleiben Sie vor Viren, Malware und anderen ungebetenen Besuchern geschützt.
LEARN_MORE_FEATURES_SECURITY_SECTION1_DE.description: Explains that Chromebooks are protected from many common security issues due to additional layers of security

LEARN_MORE_FEATURES_SECURITY_SECTION2_TI.description: Summarizes that documents and files are secure when using a Chromebook

LEARN_MORE_FEATURES_SECURITY_SECTION2_DE.message: Mit Google Drive, unserem Online-Dateispeicherdienst, können Sie Ihre Dateien sichern und von überall aus aufrufen.
LEARN_MORE_FEATURES_SECURITY_SECTION2_DE.description: Explains a key benefit of Google Drive, Google’s online file storage service -- files are stored online so they can be securely accessed from different devices and from different locations

LEARN_MORE_OFFLINE_TITLE.description: Summarizes that Chromebooks are functional even when they are not connected to the internet

LEARN_MORE_OFFLINE_DESCRIPTION.message: Mit Chromebooks können Sie Dinge auch ohne Internetverbindung erledigen.
LEARN_MORE_OFFLINE_DESCRIPTION.description: Explains that Chromebooks can help the user accomplish tasks even when the Chromebook is not connected to the internet

LEARN_MORE_OFFLINE_SECTION1_TITLE.message: Ihre Lieblings-Apps sind schon an Bord
LEARN_MORE_OFFLINE_SECTION1_TITLE.description: Summarizes that many great applications are pre-installed in the Chromebook

LEARN_MORE_OFFLINE_SECTION1_DESCRIPTION.message: Mit Apps wie Google Docs, Gmail offline, Mediaplayer und Foto-Editor können Sie auch von unterwegs aus produktiv bleiben.
LEARN_MORE_OFFLINE_SECTION1_DESCRIPTION.description: Lists examples of applications that help the user accomplish tasks even when the Chromebook is offline, for example when the user is traveling

LEARN_MORE_OFFLINE_SECTION2_TITLE.message: Weitere Apps im Chrome Web Store
LEARN_MORE_OFFLINE_SECTION2_TITLE.description: Summarizes that additional applications can be found on the Chrome Web Store

LEARN_MORE_OFFLINE_SECTION2_DESCRIPTION.message: Viele weitere kostenlose Offline-Apps gibt es im Chrome Web Store.
LEARN_MORE_OFFLINE_SECTION2_DESCRIPTION.description: Explains that more applications can be found for the Chromebook, free of charge, from the Chrome Web Store

LEARN_MORE_PRINTING_TITLE.description: Summarizes that Chromebooks can print wirelessly

LEARN_MORE_PRINTING_DESCRIPTION.message: Mit Ihrem Chromebook können Sie kabellos auf jedem cloud-fähigen Drucker drucken.
LEARN_MORE_PRINTING_DESCRIPTION.description: Explains that Chromebooks can print without cables by using a cloud-connected printer

LEARN_MORE_PRINTING_SECTION1_TITLE.description: States the name of Google’s printing solution, Google Cloud Print

LEARN_MORE_PRINTING_SECTION1_DESCRIPTION.message: Cloud Print funktioniert über das Web. So können Sie mit Ihrem Chromebook von zu Hause oder unterwegs aus drucken.

LEARN_MORE_PRINTING_SECTION2_TITLE.description: Summarizes that Chromebooks can also print using printers that are not Cloud Ready (i.e., a conventional printer)

LEARN_MORE_PRINTING_SECTION2_DESCRIPTION.message: Cloud-fähige Drucker sind sofort einsatzbereit. Sie können jedoch auch einen PC oder Mac und einen klassischen Drucker an Ihr Chromebook anschließen.
LEARN_MORE_PRINTING_SECTION2_DESCRIPTION.description: Explains that Chromebooks have the ability to print

LEARN_MORE_DO_MORE_TITLE.description: States the name of Google’s web streaming product for televisions, Chromecast

LEARN_MORE_DO_MORE_DESCRIPTION.message: Übertragen Sie Ihre Lieblings-Onlineunterhaltung von Ihrem Chromebook auf Ihren Fernseher. Für nur 35 $$.
LEARN_MORE_DO_MORE_DESCRIPTION.description: Explains that Chromecast allows users to display online content from the Chromebook on a television and that it only costs $$35

LEARN_MORE_DO_MORE_SECTION1_TITLE.description: Summarizes that you can watch your television content with other people while relaxing comfortably

LEARN_MORE_DO_MORE_SECTION1_DESCRIPTION.message: Schauen Sie Online-Filme, Musik und mehr auf Ihrem Fernseher an.
LEARN_MORE_DO_MORE_SECTION1_DESCRIPTION.description: Explains that many different forms of web content can be viewed on your television using Chromecast

LEARN_MORE_DO_MORE_SECTION2_TITLE.description: Summarizes that content from the internet can be displayed on your television

LEARN_MORE_DO_MORE_SECTION2_DESCRIPTION.message: Übertragen Sie einen Chrome-Tab von Ihrem Chromebook auf Ihren Fernseher zu Hause (Beta).
LEARN_MORE_DO_MORE_SECTION2_DESCRIPTION.description: Explains that content from the Chrome browser can be displayed on your television using a Chromebook. The ‘(beta)’ refers to the fact that this feature is still under development.
